SEARCH
Module org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi
Package org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi

Class AFNaming

java.lang.Object
org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi.AFNaming
Direct Known Subclasses:
AFUNIXNaming
public abstract class AFNaming extends Object
The AFSocket-compatible equivalent of Naming. Use this class for accessing RMI registries that are reachable by AFSockets.
Author:
Christian Kohlsch√ºtter

    • AFNaming

      protected AFNaming(int registryPort, int servicePort)
      Creates a new naming instance with the given ports.
      Parameters:
      registryPort - The registry port.
      servicePort - The port for AFRMIService.

  • Method Details

    • newAFRegistry

      protected abstract AFRegistry newAFRegistry(Registry impl) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new AFRegistry given a Registry implementation.
      Parameters:
      impl - The implementation.
      Returns:
      The new AFRegistry instance.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - on error.

    • initSocketFactory

      protected abstract AFRMISocketFactory initSocketFactory() throws IOException
      Creates or returns the AFRMISocketFactory to be used with this instance.
      Returns:
      The socket factory.
      Throws:
      IOException - on error.

    • getSocketFactory

      public AFRMISocketFactory getSocketFactory()
      Returns the AFRMISocketFactory associated with this instance.
      Returns:
      The AFRMISocketFactory.

    • getRegistryPort

      public final int getRegistryPort()
      Returns the registry port.
      Returns:
      The port.

    • getRegistry

      public AFRegistry getRegistry() throws RemoteException
      Returns a reference to the existing RMI registry. If there's no registry running at this port, an exception is thrown.
      Returns:
      The registry.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there was a problem.

    • getRegistry

      public AFRegistry getRegistry(long timeout, TimeUnit unit) throws RemoteException
      Returns a reference to the existing RMI registry. If there's no registry running at this port after waiting for up to the given time, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The timeout value.
      unit - The timeout unit.
      Returns:
      The registry.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there was a problem.

    • openRegistry

      protected abstract AFRegistry openRegistry(long timeout, TimeUnit unit) throws RemoteException
      Tries to access the registry, waiting some time if necessary.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The timeout.
      unit - The unit for the timeout.
      Returns:
      The registry instance.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - on error.

    • getRegistry

      public AFRegistry getRegistry(boolean create) throws RemoteException
      Returns a reference to the RMI registry, or null. If there's no registry running at this port, and create is set to true, a new one is created; when create is set to false, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      create - true if a new register may be created if necessary.
      Returns:
      The registry, or null
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there was a problem.

    • shutdownRegistry

      public void shutdownRegistry() throws RemoteException
      Shuts this RMI Registry down.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.

    • shutdownRegistryFinishingTouches

      protected abstract void shutdownRegistryFinishingTouches()
      Called by shutdownRegistry() as the final step.

    • createRegistry

      public AFRegistry createRegistry() throws RemoteException
      Creates a new RMI Registry. If there already was a registry created previously, it is shut down and replaced by the current one. Use getRegistry() to try to reuse an existing registry.
      Returns:
      The registry
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.
      See Also:
      • getRegistry()

    • initRegistryPrerequisites

      protected abstract void initRegistryPrerequisites() throws ServerException
      Called by createRegistry() right before creating/setting the registry.
      Throws:
      ServerException - on error.

    • isRemoteShutdownAllowed

      public boolean isRemoteShutdownAllowed()
      Checks if this AFNaming instance can be shut down remotely.
      Returns:
      true if remote shutdown is allowed.

    • setRemoteShutdownAllowed

      public void setRemoteShutdownAllowed(boolean remoteShutdownAllowed)
      Controls whether this AFNaming instance can be shut down remotely.
      Parameters:
      remoteShutdownAllowed - true if remote shutdown is allowed.

    • exportAndBind

      public void exportAndBind(String name, Remote obj) throws RemoteException, AlreadyBoundException
      Exports and binds the given Remote object to the given name, using the given AFNaming setup.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to use to bind the object in the registry.
      obj - The object to export and bind.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.
      AlreadyBoundException - if there already was something bound at that name

    • exportAndRebind

      public void exportAndRebind(String name, Remote obj) throws RemoteException
      Exports and re-binds the given Remote object to the given name, using the given AFNaming setup.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to use to bind the object in the registry.
      obj - The object to export and bind.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.

    • unexportAndUnbind

      public void unexportAndUnbind(String name, Remote obj) throws RemoteException
      Forcibly un-exports the given object, if it exists, and unbinds the object from the registry (otherwise returns without an error).
      Parameters:
      name - The name used to bind the object.
      obj - The object to un-export.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.

    • exportObject

      public static Remote exportObject(Remote obj, RMISocketFactory socketFactory) throws RemoteException
      Exports the given Remote object, using the given socket factory and a randomly assigned port. NOTE: This helper function can also be used for regular RMI servers.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to export.
      socketFactory - The socket factory to use.
      Returns:
      The remote stub.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the operation fails.

    • unexportObject

      public static void unexportObject(Remote obj)
      Forcibly un-exports the given object, if it exists (otherwise returns without an error). This should be called upon closing a Closeable Remote object. NOTE: This helper function can also be used for regular RMI servers.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to un-export.

    • lookup

      public Remote lookup(String name) throws NotBoundException, MalformedURLException, RemoteException
      Convenience method for getRegistry().lookup.
      Parameters:
      name - the name for the remote reference to look up
      Returns:
      The instance
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - upon error
      MalformedURLException - upon error
      RemoteException - upon error
      See Also:
      • AFRegistry.lookup(String)

    • lookup

      Parameters:
      name - the name for the remote reference to look up
      timeout - The timeout value.
      unit - The timeout unit.
      Returns:
      The instance
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - upon error
      MalformedURLException - upon error
      RemoteException - upon error

      public void bind(String name, Remote obj) throws AlreadyBoundException, MalformedURLException, RemoteException
      Convenience method for getRegistry().bind.

      name - the name for the remote reference to bind
      obj - the remote reference to bind
      Throws:
      RemoteException - upon error
      AlreadyBoundException - upon error
      MalformedURLException - upon error

    • rebind

      public void rebind(String name, Remote obj) throws MalformedURLException, RemoteException
      Convenience method for getRegistry().rebind.
      Parameters:
      name - the name for the remote reference to rebind
      obj - the remote reference to rebind
      Throws:
      RemoteException - upon error
      MalformedURLException - upon error
      See Also:
      • AFRegistry.rebind(String, Remote)

    • list

      public String[] list() throws RemoteException, AccessException
      Convenience method for getRegistry().list. Unlike AFRegistry.list(), in case the registry has been shut down already, an empty array is returned.
      Returns:
      an array of the names bound in this registry
      Throws:
      RemoteException - upon error
      AccessException - upon error
